/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors including red, white, and gray. Cars and bicycles are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the daily life and activity in the area. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the background, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the city's vibrant street life and architectural diversity.
